name: Clone Runner
description:
arrows/wasd keys to move

F to create Clones

R to cycle through Clones

E to interact

You are a robot with the ability to clone itself , using these abilities you must transverse each level , solve puzzles and Win.

This was made in the ZENOJAM over the course of 3 days.

The theme was "I am EVERYWHERE" and our little robot reflects that by being able to clones himself 3 times per level therefore being everywhere.

README:This game does not have a proper ending yet, me and my friend may expand on this prototype in the future.(eg more mechanics, more puzzle types , story,ect)
